metadata.synopsis: One-liner for the onlooker 4 from the Eastway Doom Sayer Vignette.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the onlooker 4 from the Eastway Doomsayer vignette, on the plaza between the Elfsong tavern and Baldur's Mouth.

0.speaker: Phyria Gollus
0.text: The Steel Watchers are a modern marvel - they'll protect us when the time comes.

1.speaker: Phyria Gollus
1.text: If, uh, if you ever happen to see some unattended Steel Watcher schematics, I wouldn't say no to taking a peek...

2.speaker: Phyria Gollus
2.text: The Steel Watchers are doing most of the good here, really. I'd love a gander at those schematics...
2.context: NodeContext: Impressed by the Steel Watchers

3.speaker: Phyria Gollus
3.text: The Steel Watch'll come for you when the time is right, make no mistake.

4.speaker: Phyria Gollus
4.text: Someone as accomplished as you has to appreciate the fine engineering work on those Steel Watchers.
4.context: NodeContext: Definitely thinks the player is also a Steel Watcher fan

5.speaker: Phyria Gollus
5.text: You're exactly the type of person the Steel Watchers were built to deal with.
